1.text: Combine the sweetened condensed milk, sugar, and cornstarch.

2.text: Stir and cook the slime for 10 to 15 minutes.

3.text: Mix in food coloring if desired.

4.text: Cool the slime completely before using it.

5.text: Refrigerate the slime for up to 5 days.

6.text: Put the mini-marshmallows and oil in a bowl.

7.text: Microwave the marshmallows for 10 seconds at a time until they melt.

8.text: Stir 4 to 5 drops of food coloring into the marshmallows.

9.text: Combine the powdered sugar and cornstarch on a plate.

10.text: Transfer the marshmallows to the plate and mix it.

12.text: Use and store the marshmallow slime for up 5 days.

13.text: Microwave the gummy bears for 30 seconds.

14.text: Stir and microwave the gummy bears for 10 second intervals.

15.text: Mix the cornstarch and powdered sugar on a plate.

16.text: Pour the melted gummy bears onto the plate and let it cool.

17.text: Mix the gummy mixture into the cornstarch and powdered sugar.

18.text: Knead 1⁄2 tablespoon (7.4 ml) of vegetable or coconut oil into the slime.

19.text: Play with the gummy bear slime.
